channel.title: Help plx. :)
channel.description: alright, i downloaded a client/source, how do i make it so i can log on through my own ip so i can edit it, because i used to code in the old days without d/l clients.so its kindof new to me, if anyone could give me "Running a client server for Dummies" kindof thing that would be nice.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 03, 2009, 09:09:42 pm[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: Help plx. :)
item.dc:creator: @Daikenkai Daikenkai
item.description:
@Daikenkai wrote:

All you do is go into your server folder, click run.bat, the picture of the gear. Then do the same thing in your client folder, then log in under any name and password. Uh, i'm not sure what else you could mean.

Read full topic
